body:
Now, Lots of people use this and I see many ask what does this and that mean. so anyway here is some please suggest if you want to see more


                                                  Game Related 

                     GLHF = Good Luck Have Fun
                     GL = Good Luck
                     GF = Good Fight
                     FTW = For The Win
                     Ez = The Player is Easy - Note: This is mean Don't say this
                     GG = Good Game
                     GGWP = Good Game Well Played
                     GJ = Good Job
                     WP = Well Played 
                     G2g = Got to go
                     Gtg = Got to go
                     srs = serious
                     srsly = seriously?
                     l8r = later
                    gr8 = great
                    wb = welcome back
                                          

                                Forum Related
                BUMP = Just Made it newer 
                


                                               Other
           OP = Overpowered 
           Plz = Please
           Thx = Thank You
           Sry = Sorry
           Da = The 
           Der = OBVIOUS
           Dat = That
           Ty - Thank you
           Yw - Your welcome
           Np - No problem
           Brb = Be right back
           Idc = I don't care
           Idk = I don't know.
           omg = oh my gosh 
         GF= Good fun
         KYC= Keep your cool
          OMW= On my way
         ATM= At the moment


                                                         Player Suggested
                            
            DIAF= Die In A Fire <--- Not Nice:/

title: Abbreviations

replies.body:
DIAF= Die In A Fire. 
This is used in a joking sense and is no meant to be offending.

WP= Well Played.
replies.body_tagged:
DIAF= Die In A Fire. 
This is used in a joking sense and is no meant to be offending.

WP= Well Played.

replies.body:
Could I please suggest a change to the meaning if Bump? From experience of many trading card and sports forums I believe the meaning is: A meaningless reply to a thread to move it to the top of the thread list. 

:)

also I think you should add YW - Your Welcome

replies.body:
Some of these, such as: 'Die In A Fire' aren't really very nice and shouldn't be used, even if it is mean't as a joke; some people may not take it in a jokey way.

If you're going to say something like that then let the person you're saying it to know that you're only joking so that you don't offend anyone and so that you don't get yourself into trouble :)
replies.body_tagged:
Some of these, such as: 'Die In A Fire' aren't really very nice and shouldn't be used, even if it is mean't as a joke; some people may not take it in a jokey way.

If you're going to say something like that then let the person you're saying it to know that you're only joking so that you don't offend anyone and so that you don't get yourself into trouble :)

replies.body: Well said! I know it is stated in the thread but terms like "eZ" won't be tolerated. When ever you use an possible offensive  term or abbreviations against someone explain that it just a joke, or just don't do it at all. You don't know the impact of words on someone and saying "sorry" doesn't always help :)
replies.body_tagged: Well said! I know it is stated in the thread but terms like "eZ" won't be tolerated. You don't know the impact of words on someone and saying "sorry" doesn't always help :)

replies.body:
I completely agree with you.
Considering it's not a very popular joke, I can understand the confusion.
This is why I added an explanation next to it.

What you said applies to all jokes in general. 
Make sure everyone knows you're joking and make sure everyone is having fun!
replies.body_tagged:
I completely agree with you.
Considering it's not a very popular joke, I can understand the confusion.

Make sure everyone knows you're joking and make sure everyone is having fun!
